Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.15917541]Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli U16318 (MIC=9-3 µM);Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus B38302 (MIC=4.5-1.5 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.15917541]LC50=50 μM against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Structure Description: The Ramachandran plot of P showes that residues 2 and 4-13 are all in α-helix regions of the plot; the residues in all of the structures are in the core α-helix region for residues 2, 3, and 6-11, and both residue 5 and 12 had over 60% in the core and the rest in allowed α-helix regions.
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activity. Also has hemolytic activity against red blood cells (RBCs).

Literature.Title: Consequences of N-acylation on structure and membrane binding properties of dermaseptin derivative K4-S4-(1-13).
Literature.Author: Shalev DE, Rotem S, Fish A, Mor A.

Literature.Title: Effects of acyl versus aminoacyl conjugation on the properties of antimicrobial peptides.
Literature.Author: Radzishevsky IS, Rotem S, Zaknoon F, Gaidukov L, Dagan A, Mor A.
